eng: Okay, if I have any questions, could I email them to you?
darija_ar: واخا, ألا عندي أي أسإلا, واش نسيفتهوم ليك ف إمايل?
transl: And if I don't have any questions, should I send them to you by email?

eng: if one of the team-members has something to say
darija_ar: ألا كان شي واهد من لفرقا عندو شي حاجة مايڭول
transl: If there was something different about him, he must have a hidden agenda.

eng: do you feel unable to reach the expected targets?
darija_ar: واش كاتحسّ براسك ماقادّش توسّل ل أهداف اللي عوّلتي عليها?
transl: Do you feel like you can't reach the goals you relied on?

eng: things that you feel may have been caused by something you did
darija_ar: شي حوايج اللي كاتحسّ إقدر إكونو بسباب شي حاجة درتيها
transl: Some things make you feel you can be because of something you did.

eng: I believe this is the first time we've used this thing
darija_ar: كايبالّيا هادي هيا لمرّا اللوولا لي خدّمنا فيها هاد اللعيبا
transl: This is the first time we have worked together on this project.

eng: And frankly, do you think they'll open the plane doors and let us jump?
darija_ar: و صاراحاتان, واش كاتضنّ غايحلّو لبيبان ت طيّارا ويخلّيونا النقّزو?
transl: And by the way, do you think they will let us ride the plane and experience flying?

eng: You know, from where we fall, it doesn't make much difference
darija_ar: عرفتي شنو, من لبلاصا مناش طحنا, ماكاينش شي فرق كبير
transl: You know what, from my point of view, it doesn't matter, there is no big difference.

eng: I'm quite glad it's mine coming and not yours
darija_ar: أنا فرحان شويا بي أنّاهو ديالي اللي جاي ماشي ديالك
transl: I'm a little happy that my friend is coming, not yours.

eng: It was the only way to get them to give us back our food
darija_ar: كانت هاديك هيا طاريقا لواهيدا باش نجعلوهوم إردّو لينا ماكلتنا
transl: That was the only way to get them to return our belongings.

eng: But you're lucky I was able to do my homework last Thursday
darija_ar: والاكين عندك الزهر ڭدّيت نصاوب التامارين ديالي لخميس اللي فات
transl: I forgot to water my flowers, so I will do it this Thursday.

eng: You should put Facebook and any other diverting social media sites away
darija_ar: خسّك تبعّد عليك فاسبوك أُ ڭاع ماواقيع تاواصول لجتيماعي لخرين
transl: It's better to stay away from Facebook and social media to avoid negative interactions.

eng: Would it not be better if we think about something positive and fun?
darija_ar: واش ماشي حسّن أنّانا نفكّرو فشي حاجة إجابيا أُ كاتنشّط
transl: Isn't it better that we think about something positive that motivates us?

eng: I think they know it's stuck and will start winching it down to the floor below soon
darija_ar: كانضنّ أنّهو مبلوكي أُ غايبداو إجرّوه اللتحت من دابا شويا
transl: He thought he was stuck, but they managed to pull him out from underneath in the end.

eng: No, I haven't felt sociable or confident around people
darija_ar: لا, ماتانحسّش براسي جتيماعي أُلا واتق من نفسي فوست الناس
transl: No, I don't feel comfortable in social gatherings and I tend to avoid people.

eng: Food can have a very important effect on how you feel, you know.
darija_ar: لماكلا إقدر تكون عندها أتار كبير علا كيفاش كاتحسّ, فراسك.
transl: No matter how big her impact is, you can always control how you feel about yourself.

eng: If we can eat one piece of bread in the water, then we get 20 points
darija_ar: ألا قدرنا ناكلو طرف تلخوبز فلما, ديكسّاع غاناخدو 20 نوقطا
transl: We managed to eat a piece of pizza at the cinema, it cost us 20 dirhams.

eng: Oh you had better get on and get some handsome men invited then!
darija_ar: أه, إوا حسن ليك تنوضي أُتعرضي علا شي رجال زوينين!
transl: Oh, you're good at attracting the attention of handsome men!

eng: I'm really happy tonight, I'm throwing a party at my house!
darija_ar: أنا ناشط بلمعقول هاد الليلا, غاندير شي حفلا ف الدار!
transl: I'm feeling energetic tonight, I might throw a party at home!

eng: I know it's a little late for the organization, but... it's my birthday!
darija_ar: فراسي مشا لحال شويا علا التنضيم, والاكين... راه عيد ميلادي!
transl: My brother went alone for a bit to organize, and the cake... it's my birthday!

eng: Do you have any idea how to make sauce without salt that is good?
darija_ar: عندك شي فيكرا كيفاش كاتصاوب صوص بلا ملحا اللي زوينا?
transl: Do you have any idea how to make a tasty sauce without salt?

eng: Yeah, it's good to do something other than watching TV
darija_ar: وايه, مزيان تدير شي حاجة من غير لفراجا ت تلفازا
transl: Yeah, it's nice to do something without the need for a TV.

eng: I have to take these pills to calm me down when I'm working with you
darija_ar: خسّني ناخود هاد الدوا باش نتكالما فاش كانكون خدّام معاك
transl: Let me take this medicine so we can talk when you finish working.

eng: How about we have one game and you can come back and sunbath after?
darija_ar: أشبالّيك نقصّرو ماتش واهد أُ تقدر ترجع تبرونزا من بعد?
transl: Your team lost the match, do you think they can still win the bronze medal afterwards?

eng: As for the outside will be fine, I have an umbrella in case it starts to rain.
darija_ar: فلخارج غايكون مزيان, عندي واهد لمضلّا فحالات بدات كاتصبّ شتا.
transl: The weather outside will be nice, but I have a coat ready for when the cold starts to hit.

eng: Yes, you couldn't be alone in that house any more.
darija_ar: وايه, ماكنتيش تقدر تبقا بوحدك فديك الدار كتر من هاكّا.
transl: Oh, you couldn't stay alone in that house more than that.

eng: although I should be thinking about saving money if I'm not going to get a pay rise
darija_ar: واخا خسّني نكون تانفكّر نخبّي لفلوس ألا ماكانش غايزادني فلخلاص
transl: Even if I lose, I would never think of hiding the money because it wouldn't benefit me in the end.

eng: good luck when that hits the front page of the daily papers
darija_ar: حاضّ ساعيد فاش هادشي إخرج ف صفحا لولا ديال جورنانات
transl: I will never understand why this came out on the front page of newspapers.

eng: If it gets dark and we can't find our way, I'm gonna cry!
darija_ar: ألا طاح الضلام أُ ماڭدّيناش نلقاو تريقنا, غادي نبدا نبكي!
transl: When darkness falls and we can't find our way, we will start crying!

eng: You'll have to learn to obey me, or I'll find another one.
darija_ar: غايخسّك تعلّم تصنّت ليا, أُلا غادي نضبّر علا واهد أخور.
transl: I will teach you how to swim, so we can plan a beach trip together.

eng: if you just trusted all of us to do our jobs we would be so much more effective
darija_ar: كون هير تيّقتينا كولّنا أنانا غانديرو خدامينا غانكونو فعّالين كتر
transl: When you lead us, tell us what to do, our workers will be more efficient.

eng: And by some miracle it never broke down with me in it again.
darija_ar: أُ بحال شي موعجيزا, ماعمرو خسر أُ أنا فيه باقي
transl: Like a miracle, I have never lost hope in it.

eng: Well I can tell you for nothing I am not going to work in here
darija_ar: لموهيم نقدر نڭوليك أنّاهو مايمكنش نخدم هنا واخا ماعارفت أش
transl: Sorry, we can tell you that we can't work here because we don't know what to do.

eng: He would have yelled at me, with no respect for his boss.
darija_ar: كان غادي يغووت عليا, بلا حتا حتيرام ل مودير ديالو
transl: He was going to yell at me, without even respecting his manager.

eng: The medicinal herbs will allow you to heal and get back on your feet!
darija_ar: لعسهوب غادي يعاونوك باش تبرا أُ تعاود توڭوف علا رجليك
transl: The physiotherapist will help you to recover so you can walk again.

eng: And I just glued my hand to the desk in Art.
darija_ar: أُ يالّاه لسّق يدي ف تبلا فلحيسّا ديال تافاتّوح لفانّي
transl: Come on, let me wash my hands in the fountain of Tafatthouh in Fes.

eng: It's a bit embarrassing, but I've never been any good at my times tables...
darija_ar: حشمت شويا, والاكين ماعمرني كنت كانعرف مزيان ل جاداويل ضارب
transl: I felt a bit embarrassed, as I had never known how to play billiards well.

eng: And now, years later, look where I am!
darija_ar: أُ دابا, شحال من عام من بعد, شوف فين أنا!
transl: Now, how many years later, look where I am!

eng: Wow, you're the first teacher who's ever done anything nice for me!
darija_ar: ووو, نتا أوّال أُستاد لي كايدير معايا شي حاجا مزيانا!
transl: Wow, you are the first teacher who does something nice with me!

eng: Maybe you can use a computer translator to help you?
darija_ar: جرّبتي تستعمل شي پروڭرام ديال ترجاما فل پيسّي باش يعاون?
transl: Have you tried using any translation program on the computer to help?

eng: They might notice if I bring my laptop to the exam.
darija_ar: راه غادي يعيقو بيا إلا جبت معايا ل پيسّي اللمتيحان
transl: They will not let me in unless I bring the exam admission ticket with me.

eng: If we keep it that way, we'll go into the wall, for sure.
darija_ar: إلا بقينا هاكّا, غادي ندخلو ف شي حيط, مافيها شك
transl: If we stay like this, we will end up hitting a wall, no doubt.

eng: Can't you ask me now, I might not be here at the next class
darija_ar: مايمكنش ليك تسوولني دابا? موحال نكون هنا فل حيصّا الجايّا
transl: Can you help me now? It's impossible for us to be here in the next event.

eng: Just because we are old does not mean we have lost all sense of taste
darija_ar: غير حيت حنا كبار فلعمر ماكايعنيش أنّاهو مابقاش عندنا داوق
transl: As we grow older, it doesn't mean we no longer have a taste.

eng: you know I ve a wicked sense of humour, mind you, I am not sure they always get me
darija_ar: عرفتي عندي واحد روح دوعابا فشكل, ماعرفتش واش ديما كايفهموني
transl: I have a friend who is a bit strange, I don't know if they always understand me.

eng: The doctor gave me a check-up last week and said I was as fit as a fiddle.
darija_ar: طبيب دووز ليا ديك سيمانا أُ ڭاليا راني صحيح فصيح.
transl: The doctor told me last week that I am healthy and fine.

eng: I'll ring the bell to get someone to get you a coffee.
darija_ar: غادي ندق لجاراس باش يجي شي واحد يجيب ليك لقهوا.
transl: I will go to the neighbor's to have someone bring you coffee.

eng: And once in a while someone comes in to entertain us.
darija_ar: أُ مرّا فشحال كايجي شي واحد يدير لينا شي سپكتاكل.
transl: Every now and then someone comes and puts on a spectacle for us.

eng: Ouf... I wish I could have spent the day at home with the dog...
darija_ar: وف... كانتمنّا كون دووزت نهار غي ف الدار معا لكلب...
transl: I wish I could spend the whole day at home with the dog...

eng: He needs to get used to bad weather, we are planning to move to Essaouira after all!
darija_ar: خاسّو يولّف لجوو لخايب, راه ناويين نرحلو ل صويرا أصلان!
transl: They decided to go to the beach, as they are planning to travel to Essaouira tomorrow!

eng: I hope you enjoy the orange juice and get to see the art gallery.
darija_ar: نتمنّا يعجبك لعاصير ديال ليمون أُ تمشي تشوف لمعريض لفنّي.
transl: We hope you enjoy the lemonade and go see the art exhibition.

eng: You could move in here, in that retirement home, wouldn't you?
darija_ar: يمكن ليك تحّوول هنا, ل هاد دار لعاجازا, ولا اللا?
transl: Can you turn here, to this house for the elderly, or not?

eng: Oh that does sound good, and quite fancy for a retirement home
darija_ar: أُه هادشي كايفرّح, أُ مبرّع ب نيسبا ل دار لعاجازا
transl: Oh, this is so joyful, a memory linked to the old house.

eng: I mean, given what it costs me every month, luckily it's free.
darija_ar: كانقصد, إلا شفنا شحال كانخلص كولّا شهر, هامدولّاه أنّاهوم فابور.
transl: I mean, but we saw how much he used to spend every month, now he's broke.

eng: But it would be nice to do experience those things with someone else
darija_ar: والاكين أتكون زينا أنّاك تعيش هادشي معا شي شاخص اخار
transl: Or maybe it's better for you to experience this with someone else.

eng: I know but it's my party so I decide!
darija_ar: عرفت والاكين هادي لحفلا ديالي إدان أنا اللي غادي نقرّر!
transl: I know, but this is my party, so I will decide!

eng: But I think I see a Thermos in the back of the basket.
darija_ar: والاكين يمكن بانت ليا شي طيرموس ف اللور ديال السلّا.
transl: Or maybe a moth flew into my lantern.

eng: I'm scared looking out of my second-floor window at home!
darija_ar: كانخاف نشوف من شرجم ديالي ف الطبقا تانيا ف الدار!
transl: I'm afraid we might see one of my spiders in the second floor of the house!

eng: But, whilst you're here, could you go get me a glass of water perhaps?
darija_ar: والاكين, ماحدّك هنا, تقدر تمشي تجيب ليا كاسّ ديال لما?
transl: Hey, no one's here, can you go get me a glass of water?

eng: But without a compass it's hard to know which way to return even with the map.
darija_ar: والاكين بلا باوصالا سعيب تعرف منين ترجع واخا بل خاريطا.
transl: Without a compass, it's difficult to know how to get back, especially in the wilderness.

eng: I fly quite often and just try not to think about the process too much
darija_ar: كانركب ف طيارا بزّاف غير حاول ماتفكرتش بزّاف فل مسألا
transl: I have been on many planes, but I never thought too much about the issue.

eng: I can give you a comic book, I've brought a comic book.
darija_ar: نقدر نعتيك كتاب ديال أرّوسوم, جبت معايا كتاب ديال أرّوسوم
transl: We can lend you a book of cartoons, I brought a book of cartoons with me.

eng: I'm sorry to be such a party pooper, but I'm really tired.
darija_ar: سمح ليا ماحاملش نرييب لحفلا, والاكين راني عييان ديال بصّاح.
transl: Excuse me, I didn't bring a gift to the party, otherwise I would have brought a bottle of juice.

eng: Anyway, I'm glad it's you that I'm stuck with in this elevator, and not Souad.
darija_ar: علا كولحال,انا فارحان نتا اللي واحالت معاه فلماسعاد, أُماشي صواد.
transl: Anyway, I'm glad you had a good time with him in happiness, that's great.

eng: That's terrible and knowing that doesn't help my nerves.
darija_ar: هادشي خايب بزف أُ ملي كتعرف هادشي ماكايعاونش أعساب ديالي.
transl: This thing is disappointing, especially when you know that it doesn't help my situation.

eng: Tell me about it, I'm sure it's a placebo what he gave you.
darija_ar: ڭول ليا علا داكشي, أنا متأكد بلي دوا واهمي ليعتاك.
transl: Tell me about that, I'm sure that the medicine will help you.

eng: Don't worry, I'm sure we'll all be there, your friend there.
darija_ar: ماتقلّقش, أنا متأكد بلي غادي نكونو تما كاملين, ساحبك تما.
transl: Don't worry, I'm sure we will be fine, I got your back.

eng: He's scheduled to be completely in Lithuanian, and I will understand nothing.
darija_ar: خاتات بلي غادي إكون كاملو بلوغا ليتهوانيا, أُماغادي نفهم تاحاجا.
transl: She said she's going to study in Lithuania, I need to understand things.

eng: I'm not sure what a wrong is, but if you really think you can do it, go ahead.
darija_ar: مامتأكدش شناهوا لخاتاء, والاكين إلا كنتي كادن تقدر الديرو, بدا.
transl: Are you sure about the dress, or do you want me to help you choose another one?

eng: We can use the smoke to communicate in Morse code.
darija_ar: نقدرو نخدمو ب دوخان باش نتواسلو ف شيفرا ديال مورس."
transl: We can work together in a team to communicate in Morse code.

eng: We'll leave the basics if we need to, but we can't give up.
darija_ar: غادي نخليو لحاجات لموهيما إلا كان خاسنا, والاكين ماغاديش نستاسلمو.
transl: We will only leave things to fate if we lose, otherwise we will not give up.

eng: I'm a computer engineer, and I work from home, too.
darija_ar: أنا موهنديس ف إنفورماتيقو, أُ كانخدام من دار, حتا أنا.
transl: I am not good at informatics, I only use it at home, just like me.

eng: I usually do most of my homework and I do turn up generally
darija_ar: أنا مارّا مارّا كاندير أغلاب التامارين ديالي أُ عومومان كانحدر
transl: I often go to the beach to swim and relax.

eng: I just checked and you can find the song on youtube
darija_ar: راه يالاه قالابت أُ تاقدر تالقا ل أُغنييا ف يوتوب
transl: Wow, she started singing so well that she could become a famous singer on YouTube.

eng: She said afterwards to me she was going to get a restraining order against him
darija_ar: ڭالت لييا موراها بيلا غادي تاحصل علا أمر تاقييدي ضادو
transl: She told me that later on you will find out about the matter you are curious about.

eng: I just want to take a long hot shower and have a beer.
darija_ar: أنا فاقاط بغيت نضرب شي عوما سخونا أُ شي بيرّا
transl: I'm exhausted, I want to hit the pool or drink a cold beer.

eng: As long as you're not asking me to watch football and warm up a frozen pizza
darija_ar: ماحدّ ماكاطلبش مني تفاراج ف كورا أُ تساخن پيزّا مجامدا
transl: No one asked me to order a hot pizza for delivery.

eng: Oh yes, I met Latifa on my way in, she did seem very nice
darija_ar: أُه أه, تلاقيت معا لاتيفا فتريقي, بانت ليا درايفا بزف
transl: Oh, I met Latifa at the party, she seemed very elegant to me.

eng: But it must take her some time, to take care of you.
darija_ar: والاكين راه كايخاس شاويا ديال لواقت, باش تراد ليك لبال.
transl: The baker is hiding some pieces of bread to keep them for himself.

eng: Do you want to go to the common room for a cup of tea?
darija_ar: واش بغيتي تمشي اللبيت لموشتاراك, باش تشراب كاس ديال أتاي?
transl: Do you want to go home to rest, to have a cup of tea?

eng: Well he could come along tonight and deal with Rex!
darija_ar: إوا إمكن ليه إجي هاد الليلا أُ إتعامل معا رش!
transl: Why did he come tonight to deal with the spraying!

eng: but it's my first flight ever and I'm a little scared
darija_ar: والاكين هادي أوال تسافيرا فتيّارا ليا أُ أنا خايفا شوييا
transl: These are my first flights, so I'm a little scared.

eng: Oh, come on... You know that's not true.
darija_ar: أُه, يالاه سافي ... نتا عاراف بلي هادشي ماشي سحيح.
transl: Oh, come on, Safi... you know that this is not true.

eng: We need to saveour energy for the climb and the long walk down.
darija_ar: أنحتاجو نوافّرو الطاقا ديالنا ل طلعا أُ ف النزول الطويل.
transl: We need to conserve our energy for the long descent.

eng: Now all we have to do is make the guest list and send out the invites.
darija_ar: دابا صافي خاسّنا غير نشوفو دياف لي غايحادرو ونسيفتو لعراضات.
transl: Now that it's clear, let's just go see the wild animals that are being exhibited and enjoy the shows.

eng: We could do some tourist shopping, or even go sightseeing!
darija_ar: نقدرو نمشيو نديرو تاساوق سيياحي,نشوفو ل أتار لي ف لمدينا!
transl: We can go and do a sightseeing tour, see the attractions in our city!

eng: And the nurses were not happy because they thought there was a fire in the establishment
darija_ar: أُ لفرمليات ماكانوش فارحانين حيت كايسحاب ليهوم كانت لعافيا فلموأسّاسا
transl: The brakes were not working well because when they were pressed, the car was still moving smoothly.

eng: Yes, but with the smoke of the cigar, it's not very discret
darija_ar: أه, والاكين معا دوخان ديال ڭارو, ماغاديش تبان ماخزونا بزاف
transl: Yes, and when the monkeys are with the lion, they won't appear scared at all.

eng: Or fish eggs - you didn't say what kind they were.
darija_ar: أُلا بايض ديال لحوت - ماڭلتيش ليا أشمن نوع كان.
transl: The white whale - you didn't tell me what kind it was.

eng: Yeah, make it quick, I have a meeting in 15 minutes.
darija_ar: أه, دير هادشي بزاربا, عندي إجتيماع من دابا 15 دقيقا
transl: Yes, do this quickly, I have a meeting in 15 minutes.

eng: Right, I've pressed the big red button and nothing has happened.
darija_ar: واخا, راه ورّكت علا لبوتون لحمار لكبير أُ ماوقاع والو.
transl: Wow, she really hit the nail on the head with that big donkey and the mule.

eng: That's sweet, but you know what it's like at my age
darija_ar: هاداشي زوين, والاكين راك عارف كيفاش كايكون هادشي فلعمر ديالي
transl: This is nice, and you know exactly how this is in my life.

eng: All it does is give me a blocked nose and insect bites
darija_ar: لحاجة لي كادّير هيا سدّان النيف أُ عضّان ديال لبخوش
transl: What she's doing is blocking the flow of negative energy and bad vibes.

eng: Besides, I think that's what triggers an allergic reaction.
darija_ar: زيد عليها, كانضن بلي هادشي هوا لي كايجبد لحاساسيا ديالي.
transl: Moreover, I believe that this is what nourishes my emotions.

eng: Our office is on the four hundredth floor and I have to take the stairs every day
darija_ar: لبيرو ديالنا كاين فتاباق رباعميا أُخاسني نتلاع دروج كولّا نهار
transl: Our neighborhood has a beautiful park where we can walk every day.

eng: It's up to us to pay for the repairs with our salaries!
darija_ar: راه علينا حنا باش نخلّصو فلوس إصلاحات من صاليرات ديالنا
transl: We need to save money for the repairs of our living room.

eng: But you're gonna have to do the same, you guys, do the same thing.
darija_ar: والاكين خاساك دير نافس لحاجا, نتوما ألعشران, ديرو نافس لحاجا
transl: Don't let others dictate things to you, you are the decision-makers, make your own decisions.

eng: Anyway, they seem to like two types of bread
darija_ar: علا كول حال, كايبان أنّاهو كايبغيو جوج أنواع ديال لخوبز
transl: Anyway, it seems that he likes all kinds of pastries.

eng: Yes maybe some kale and broccoli would be better for them
darija_ar: أه يقدار شوييا ديال لافت أُ لبروكولي يكون حسان ليهوم
transl: Yes, adding a little bit of broccoli can be good for them.

eng: Sometimes they are lucky and get a small dog or cat instead
darija_ar: بعد لمارات كايكونو محضوضين أُ كاياخدو كلييب ولا قطّا فبلاستهوم
transl: When the cats are hungry, they either take a piece of bread or a piece of cheese.

eng: Yes, I also like this pond with the ducks and the swans.
darija_ar: أه, حتا أنا كاتعجبني هاد ضايا معا لبط أُ لبجاع
transl: Oh, I also like this place with the ducks and the swans.
